verses.verse: These <WH428> are the statutes<WH2706> and judgments,<WH4941> which<WH834> ye shall observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> in the land,<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of thy fathers<WH1> giveth<WH5414> thee to possess<WH3423> it, all<WH3605> the days<WH3117> that<WH834> ye<WH859> live<WH2416> upon<WH5921> the earth.<WH127>

Ye shall utterly destroy<WH6> <WH6> <WH853> all<WH3605> the places,<WH4725> wherein<WH834> <WH8033> the nations<WH1471> which<WH834> <WH853> ye<WH859> shall possess<WH3423> served<WH5647> <WH853> their gods,<WH430> upon<WH5921> the high<WH7311> mountains,<WH2022> and upon<WH5921> the hills,<WH1389> and under<WH8478> every<WH3605> green<WH7488> tree: <WH6086>

And ye shall overthrow<WH5422> <WH853> their altars,<WH4196> and break<WH7665> <WH853> their pillars,<WH4676> and burn<WH8313> their groves<WH842> with fire;<WH784> and ye shall hew down<WH1438> the graven images<WH6456> of their gods,<WH430> and destroy<WH6> <WH853> the names<WH8034> of them out of<WH4480> that<WH1931> place.<WH4725>
Ye shall not<WH3808> do<WH6213> so<WH3651> unto the LORD<WH3068> your God.<WH430>

But <WH3588> <WH518> unto<WH413> the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall choose<WH977> out of all<WH4480> <WH3605> your tribes<WH7626> to put<WH7760> <WH853> his name<WH8034> there,<WH8033> even unto his habitation<WH7933> shall ye seek,<WH1875> and thither<WH8033> thou shalt come: <WH935>

And thither<WH8033> ye shall bring<WH935> your burnt offerings,<WH5930> and your sacrifices,<WH2077> and your tithes,<WH4643> and<WH853> heave offerings<WH8641> of your hand,<WH3027> and your vows,<WH5088> and your freewill offerings,<WH5071> and the firstlings<WH1062> of your herds<WH1241> and of your flocks: <WH6629>

And there<WH8033> ye shall eat<WH398> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and ye shall rejoice<WH8055> in all<WH3605> that ye put<WH4916> your hand<WH3027> unto, ye<WH859> and your households,<WH1004> wherein<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath blessed<WH1288> thee.

Ye shall not<WH3808> do<WH6213> after all<WH3605> the things that<WH834> we<WH587> do<WH6213> here<WH6311> this day,<WH3117> every man<WH376> whatsoever<WH3605> is right<WH3477> in his own eyes.<WH5869>
For <WH3588> ye are not<WH3808> as yet<WH5704> <WH6258> come<WH935> to<WH413> the rest<WH4496> and to<WH413> the inheritance,<WH5159> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> giveth<WH5414> you.

But when ye go over<WH5674> <WH853> Jordan,<WH3383> and dwell<WH3427> in the land<WH776> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> giveth you to inherit,<WH5157> <WH853> and when he giveth you rest<WH5117> from all<WH4480> <WH3605> your enemies<WH341> round about,<WH4480> <WH5439> so that ye dwell<WH3427> in safety;<WH983>

Then there shall be<WH1961> a place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall choose<WH977> to cause his name<WH8034> to dwell<WH7931> there;<WH8033> thither<WH8033> shall ye bring<WH935> <WH853> all<WH3605> that<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> you; your burnt offerings,<WH5930> and your sacrifices,<WH2077> your tithes,<WH4643> and the heave offering<WH8641> of your hand,<WH3027> and all<WH3605> your choice<WH4005> vows<WH5088> which<WH834> ye vow<WH5087> unto the LORD: <WH3068>

And ye shall rejoice<WH8055> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> your God,<WH430> ye,<WH859> and your sons,<WH1121> and your daughters,<WH1323> and your menservants,<WH5650> and your maidservants,<WH519> and the Levite<WH3881> that<WH834> is within your gates;<WH8179> forasmuch<WH3588> as he hath no<WH369> part<WH2506> nor inheritance<WH5159> with<WH854> you.
Take heed<WH8104> to thyself that<WH6435> thou offer<WH5927> not thy burnt offerings<WH5930> in every<WH3605> place<WH4725> that<WH834> thou seest: <WH7200>

But <WH3588> <WH518> in the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> shall choose<WH977> in one<WH259> of thy tribes,<WH7626> there<WH8033> thou shalt offer<WH5927> thy burnt offerings,<WH5930> and there<WH8033> thou shalt do<WH6213> all<WH3605> that<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> thee.

Notwithstanding <WH7535> thou mayest kill<WH2076> and eat<WH398> flesh<WH1320> in all<WH3605> thy gates,<WH8179> whatsoever<WH3605> thy soul<WH5315> lusteth after,<WH185> according to the blessing<WH1293> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> which<WH834> he hath given<WH5414> thee: the unclean<WH2931> and the clean<WH2889> may eat<WH398> thereof, as of the roebuck,<WH6643> and as of the hart.<WH354>
Only <WH7535> ye shall not<WH3808> eat<WH398> the blood;<WH1818> ye shall pour<WH8210> it upon<WH5921> the earth<WH776> as water.<WH4325>

Thou mayest<WH3201> not<WH3808> eat<WH398> within thy gates<WH8179> the tithe<WH4643> of thy corn,<WH1715> or of thy wine,<WH8492> or of thy oil,<WH3323> or the firstlings<WH1062> of thy herds<WH1241> or of thy flock,<WH6629> nor any<WH3605> of thy vows<WH5088> which<WH834> thou vowest,<WH5087> nor thy freewill offerings,<WH5071> or heave offering<WH8641> of thine hand: <WH3027>

But <WH3588> <WH518> thou must eat<WH398> them before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> in the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall choose,<WH977> thou,<WH859> and thy son,<WH1121> and thy daughter,<WH1323> and thy manservant,<WH5650> and thy maidservant,<WH519> and the Levite<WH3881> that<WH834> is within thy gates:<WH8179> and thou shalt rejoice<WH8055> before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> in all<WH3605> that thou puttest<WH4916> thine hands<WH3027> unto.
Take heed<WH8104> to thyself that thou forsake not<WH6435> <WH5800> <WH853> the Levite<WH3881> as long as thou livest<WH3605> <WH3117> upon<WH5921> the earth.<WH127>

When <WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall enlarge<WH7337> <WH853> thy border,<WH1366> as<WH834> he hath promised<WH1696> thee, and thou shalt say,<WH559> I will eat<WH398> flesh,<WH1320> because<WH3588> thy soul<WH5315> longeth<WH183> to eat<WH398> flesh;<WH1320> thou mayest eat<WH398> flesh,<WH1320> whatsoever<WH3605> thy soul<WH5315> lusteth after.<WH185>

If <WH3588> the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> hath chosen<WH977> to put<WH7760> his name<WH8034> there<WH8033> be too far<WH7368> from<WH4480> thee, then thou shalt kill<WH2076> of thy herd<WH4480> <WH1241> and of thy flock,<WH4480> <WH6629> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> hath given<WH5414> thee as<WH834> I have commanded<WH6680> thee, and thou shalt eat<WH398> in thy gates<WH8179> whatsoever<WH3605> thy soul<WH5315> lusteth after.<WH185>

Even <WH389> as<WH834> <WH853> the roebuck<WH6643> and the hart<WH354> is eaten,<WH398> so<WH3651> thou shalt eat<WH398> them: the unclean<WH2931> and the clean<WH2889> shall eat<WH398> of them alike.<WH3162>

Only <WH7535> be sure<WH2388> that thou eat<WH398> not<WH1115> the blood:<WH1818> for<WH3588> the blood<WH1818> is the life;<WH5315> and thou mayest not<WH3808> eat<WH398> the life<WH5315> with<WH5973> the flesh.<WH1320>
Thou shalt not<WH3808> eat<WH398> it; thou shalt pour<WH8210> it upon<WH5921> the earth<WH776> as water.<WH4325>

Thou shalt not<WH3808> eat<WH398> it; that<WH4616> it may go well<WH3190> with thee, and with thy children<WH1121> after<WH310> thee, when<WH3588> thou shalt do<WH6213> that which is right<WH3477> in the sight<WH5869> of the LORD.<WH3068>

Only <WH7535> thy holy things<WH6944> which<WH834> thou hast,<WH1961> and thy vows,<WH5088> thou shalt take,<WH5375> and go<WH935> unto<WH413> the place<WH4725> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> shall choose: <WH977>

And thou shalt offer<WH6213> thy burnt offerings,<WH5930> the flesh<WH1320> and the blood,<WH1818> upon<WH5921> the altar<WH4196> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God:<WH430> and the blood<WH1818> of thy sacrifices<WH2077> shall be poured out<WH8210> upon<WH5921> the altar<WH4196> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God,<WH430> and thou shalt eat<WH398> the flesh.<WH1320>

Observe <WH8104> and hear<WH8085> <WH853> all<WH3605> these<WH428> words<WH1697> which<WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> thee, that<WH4616> it may go well<WH3190> with thee, and with thy children<WH1121> after<WH310> thee forever,<WH5704> <WH5769> when<WH3588> thou doest<WH6213> that which is good<WH2896> and right<WH3477> in the sight<WH5869> of the LORD<WH3068> thy God.<WH430>

When <WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> thy God<WH430> shall cut off<WH3772> <WH853> the nations<WH1471> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> thee, whither<WH834> <WH8033> thou<WH859> goest<WH935> to possess<WH3423> them, and thou succeedest<WH3423> them, and dwellest<WH3427> in their land;<WH776>

Take heed<WH8104> to thyself that<WH6435> thou be not snared<WH5367> by following<WH310> them, after that<WH310> they be destroyed<WH8045> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> thee; and that<WH6435> thou inquire<WH1875> not after their gods,<WH430> saying,<WH559> How<WH349> did these<WH428> nations<WH1471> serve<WH5647> <WH853> their gods?<WH430> even so<WH3651> will I<WH589> do<WH6213> likewise.<WH1571>

Thou shalt not<WH3808> do<WH6213> so<WH3651> unto the LORD<WH3068> thy God:<WH430> for<WH3588> every<WH3605> abomination<WH8441> to the LORD,<WH3068> which<WH834> he hateth,<WH8130> have they done<WH6213> unto their gods;<WH430> for<WH3588> even<WH1571> <WH853> their sons<WH1121> and their daughters<WH1323> they have burnt<WH8313> in the fire<WH784> to their gods.<WH430>

<WH853> What thing soever<WH3605> <WH1697> <WH834> I<WH595> command<WH6680> you, observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213> it: thou shalt not<WH3808> add<WH3254> thereto,<WH5921> nor<WH3808> diminish<WH1639> from<WH4480> it.
